org.drip.portfolioconstruction.bayesian

Class ProjectionImpliedConfidenceOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.portfolioconstruction.bayesian.ProjectionImpliedConfidenceOutput

  • public class ProjectionImpliedConfidenceOutput
extends java.lang.Object
    ProjectionImpliedConfidenceOutput holds the Results of the Idzorek 2005 Black Litterman Intuitive Projection Confidence Level Estimation Run. The References are: - He. G., and R. Litterman (1999): The Intuition behind the Black-Litterman Model Portfolios, Goldman Sachs Asset Management - Idzorek, T. (2005): A Step-by-Step Guide to the Black-Litterman Model: Incorporating User-Specified Confidence Levels, Ibbotson Associates, Chicago
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
